page.title: 10Services in Insch.
page.content: There are a variety of services in Insch.Police,Fire,Health Centre and Hospital are some of the most used emergency services.And to clean up our litter we have one street orderly plus a twice weekly rubbish collection. The Library provides a selection of books and records and the Post Office provides a service with regular postal collections and deliveries.The Chemist helps with prescriptions,and also has a gift centre on his premises. Besides the bus and train services providing transport in and out of the village there are four taxi firms. There are two hotels,four garages selling petrol and two of them carry out M.O.T tests.The primary school serves the village and the wider community,as do the Scottish and English churches.Three vets tend to pets and farm animals.
